attributes.action: provide a seat for Papa Pope, leader of the Confusionist faith, in the House of Lords.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Church of England is represented in the House of Lords by 26 bishops.  The Confusionist faith is represented in Parliament by nobody at all.

It is therefore only fair that Papa Pope be allowed to represent the views of the Confusionist community in Parliament alongside the Church of England.
